Package game.actors.npcs

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.npcs.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Resettable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Abxervyer, EldentreeGuardian, ForestKeeper, HollowSoldier, LivingBranch, RedWolf, WanderingUndead
public abstract class Enemy extends Actor implements Resettable
An abstract class that represents all the enemies in the entities Created by:

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints, Rune runes, GameMap map)
      The constructor of the Enemy class.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Enemy
      displayChar - the character that will represent the Enemy in the display
      hitPoints - the Enemy's starting hit points
      runes - runes, the currency used in the world of “Designborne”
      map - instance of GameMap class to remove all spawning enemies expect Abxvervyer containing at game map

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Select the valid action with the highest priority
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed

      public void reset()
